details.quote: NEVER GIVE UP
details.title: Winston Churchill

details.quote: SUCCESS IS NOT FINAL FAILURE IS NOT FATAL
details.title: Winston Churchill

details.quote: THE ONLY LIMIT TO OUR REALIZATION OF TOMORROW IS OUR DOUBTS OF TODAY
details.title: Franklin D Roosevelt

details.quote: IN THE MIDDLE OF DIFFICULTY LIES OPPORTUNITY
details.title: Albert Einstein

details.quote: TO BE YOURSELF IN A WORLD THAT IS CONSTANTLY TRYING TO MAKE YOU SOMETHING ELSE IS THE GREATEST ACCOMPLISHMENT
details.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson

details.quote: DO NOT GO WHERE THE PATH MAY LEAD GO INSTEAD WHERE THERE IS NO PATH AND LEAVE A TRAIL
details.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson

details.quote: THE JOURNEY OF A THOUSAND MILES BEGINS WITH ONE STEP
details.title: Lao Tzu

details.quote: THAT WHICH DOES NOT KILL US MAKES US STRONGER
details.title: Friedrich Nietzsche

details.quote: LIFE IS WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU ARE BUSY MAKING OTHER PLANS
details.title: John Lennon

details.quote: THE PURPOSE OF OUR LIVES IS TO BE HAPPY
details.title: Dalai Lama

details.quote: GET BUSY LIVING OR GET BUSY DYING
details.title: Stephen King

details.quote: YOU ONLY LIVE ONCE BUT IF YOU DO IT RIGHT ONCE IS ENOUGH
details.title: Mae West

details.quote: THE BEST WAY TO PREDICT YOUR FUTURE IS TO CREATE IT
details.title: Abraham Lincoln

details.quote: IF YOU TELL THE TRUTH YOU DO NOT HAVE TO REMEMBER ANYTHING
details.title: Mark Twain

details.quote: THE GREATEST GLORY IN LIVING LIES NOT IN NEVER FALLING BUT IN RISING EVERY TIME WE FALL
details.title: Nelson Mandela

details.quote: WHAT YOU GET BY ACHIEVING YOUR GOALS IS NOT AS IMPORTANT AS WHAT YOU BECOME BY ACHIEVING YOUR GOALS
details.title: Zig Ziglar

details.quote: YOU MISS 100 PERCENT OF THE SHOTS YOU DO NOT TAKE
details.title: Wayne Gretzky

details.quote: THE BEST WAY TO GET STARTED IS TO QUIT TALKING AND BEGIN DOING
details.title: Walt Disney

details.quote: DO NOT WATCH THE CLOCK DO WHAT IT DOES KEEP GOING
details.title: Sam Levenson

details.quote: ACT AS IF WHAT YOU DO MAKES A DIFFERENCE IT DOES
details.title: William James

details.quote: BE THE CHANGE THAT YOU WISH TO SEE IN THE WORLD
details.title: Mahatma Gandhi

details.quote: HAPPINESS IS NOT SOMETHING READY MADE IT COMES FROM YOUR OWN ACTIONS
details.title: Dalai Lama

details.quote: DO WHAT YOU CAN WITH ALL YOU HAVE WHEREVER YOU ARE
details.title: Theodore Roosevelt

details.quote: BELIEVE YOU CAN AND YOU ARE HALFWAY THERE
details.title: Theodore Roosevelt

details.quote: THE ONLY WAY TO DO GREAT WORK IS TO LOVE WHAT YOU DO
details.title: Steve Jobs

details.quote: CHANGE YOUR LIFE TODAY DO NOT GAMBLE ON THE FUTURE ACT NOW WITHOUT DELAY
details.title: Simone de Beauvoir

details.quote: DO NOT WAIT THE TIME WILL NEVER BE JUST RIGHT
details.title: Napoleon Hill

details.quote: THE FUTURE BELONGS TO THOSE WHO BELIEVE IN THE BEAUTY OF THEIR DREAMS
details.title: Eleanor Roosevelt

details.quote: IT ALWAYS SEEMS IMPOSSIBLE UNTIL IT IS DONE
details.title: Nelson Mandela

details.quote: WITH THE NEW DAY COMES NEW STRENGTH AND NEW THOUGHTS
details.title: Eleanor Roosevelt

details.quote: IT IS OUR CHOICES THAT SHOW WHAT WE TRULY ARE FAR MORE THAN OUR ABILITIES
details.title: J K Rowling

details.quote: WHAT LIES BEHIND US AND WHAT LIES BEFORE US ARE TINY MATTERS COMPARED TO WHAT LIES WITHIN US
details.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson

details.quote: THE ONLY WAY TO HAVE A FRIEND IS TO BE ONE
details.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson

details.quote: IF YOU CAN DREAM IT YOU CAN DO IT
details.title: Walt Disney

details.quote: EVERY STRIKE BRINGS ME CLOSER TO THE NEXT HOME RUN
details.title: Babe Ruth

details.quote: DO NOT JUDGE EACH DAY BY THE HARVEST YOU REAP BUT BY THE SEEDS THAT YOU PLANT
details.title: Robert Louis Stevenson

details.quote: EVERYTHING YOU CAN IMAGINE IS REAL
details.title: Pablo Picasso

details.quote: IT DOES NOT MATTER HOW SLOWLY YOU GO AS LONG AS YOU DO NOT STOP
details.title: Confucius

details.quote: YOUR LIFE DOES NOT GET BETTER BY CHANCE IT GETS BETTER BY CHANGE
details.title: Jim Rohn

details.quote: THE BEST TIME TO PLANT A TREE WAS 20 YEARS AGO THE SECOND BEST TIME IS NOW
details.title: Chinese Proverb

details.quote: IN THE END, WE ONLY REGRET THE CHANCES WE DID NOT TAKE
details.title: Lewis Carroll

details.quote: IT IS NEVER TOO LATE TO BE WHAT YOU MIGHT HAVE BEEN
details.title: George Eliot

details.quote: THE PURPOSE OF LIFE IS NOT TO BE HAPPY IT IS TO BE USEFUL TO BE HONORABLE TO BE COMPASSIONATE TO HAVE IT MAKE SOME DIFFERENCE THAT YOU HAVE LIVED AND LIVED WELL
details.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson

details.quote: LIFE IS NOT MEASURED BY THE NUMBER OF BREATHS WE TAKE BUT BY THE MOMENTS THAT TAKE OUR BREATH AWAY
details.title: Anonymous

details.quote: DO NOT GO WHERE THE PATH MAY LEAD GO INSTEAD WHERE THERE IS NO PATH AND LEAVE A TRAIL
details.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson

details.quote: THE BEST WAY TO PREDICT YOUR FUTURE IS TO CREATE IT
details.title: Abraham Lincoln

details.quote: THE ONLY LIMIT TO OUR REALIZATION OF TOMORROW IS OUR DOUBTS OF TODAY
details.title: Franklin D. Roosevelt

details.quote: SUCCESS IS NOT FINAL FAILURE IS NOT FATAL IT IS THE COURAGE TO CONTINUE THAT COUNTS
details.title: Winston Churchill

details.quote: LIFE IS 10 PERCENT WHAT HAPPENS TO US AND 90 PERCENT HOW WE REACT TO IT
details.title: Charles R. Swindoll

details.quote: DO NOT WAIT FOR OPPORTUNITY CREATE IT
details.title: Anonymous

details.quote: SUCCESS USUALLY COMES TO THOSE WHO ARE TOO BUSY TO BE LOOKING FOR IT
details.title: Henry David Thoreau

details.quote: ACT AS IF WHAT YOU DO MAKES A DIFFERENCE IT DOES
details.title: William James

details.quote: NEVER DREAM ABOUT SUCCESS WORK FOR IT
details.title: Anonymous

details.quote: THE ONLY WAY TO DO GREAT WORK IS TO LOVE WHAT YOU DO
details.title: Steve Jobs

details.quote: IN ORDER TO SUCCEED WE MUST FIRST BELIEVE THAT WE CAN
details.title: Nikos Kazantzakis

details.quote: LIFE IS EITHER A DARING ADVENTURE OR NOTHING AT ALL
details.title: Helen Keller

details.quote: THE BIGGEST RISK IS NOT TAKING ANY RISK
details.title: Mark Zuckerberg

details.quote: TO LIVE IS THE RAREST THING IN THE WORLD MOST PEOPLE EXIST THAT IS ALL
details.title: Oscar Wilde

details.quote: INSPIRATION EXISTS BUT IT HAS TO FIND YOU WORKING
details.title: Pablo Picasso

details.quote: YOUR TIME IS LIMITED SO DO NOT WASTE IT LIVING SOMEONE ELSE'S LIFE
details.title: Steve Jobs

details.quote: IF YOU CAN DREAM IT YOU CAN DO IT
details.title: Walt Disney

details.quote: HAPPINESS IS NOT SOMETHING READY MADE IT COMES FROM YOUR OWN ACTIONS
details.title: Dalai Lama

details.quote: WHEN YOU COME OUT OF THE STORM YOU WON'T BE THE SAME PERSON WHO WENT IN
details.title: Haruki Murakami

details.quote: DO NOT WAIT FOR THE PERFECT MOMENT TAKE THE MOMENT AND MAKE IT PERFECT
details.title: Anonymous

details.quote: WHAT YOU GET BY ACHIEVING YOUR GOALS IS NOT AS IMPORTANT AS WHAT YOU BECOME BY ACHIEVING YOUR GOALS
details.title: Zig Ziglar

details.quote: THE SECRET OF GETTING AHEAD IS GETTING STARTED
details.title: Mark Twain

details.quote: FAILURE IS NOT THE OPPOSITE OF SUCCESS IT IS PART OF SUCCESS
details.title: Arianna Huffington

details.quote: IF YOU CAN'T FLY THEN RUN IF YOU CAN'T RUN THEN WALK IF YOU CAN'T WALK THEN CRAWL BUT WHATEVER YOU DO YOU HAVE TO KEEP MOVING FORWARD
details.title: Martin Luther King Jr.

details.quote: LIFE IS WHAT WE MAKE IT ALWAYS HAS BEEN ALWAYS WILL BE
details.title: Grandma Moses

details.quote: SUCCESS IS NOT HOW HIGH YOU HAVE CLIMBED, BUT HOW YOU MAKE A POSITIVE DIFFERENCE TO THE WORLD
details.title: Roy T. Bennett
